text.header1: Ʋu kadodowo Dedie kple Ŋkɔmaɖemaɖe to Kasm Open-in-Isolation zazã me.
text.header2: Kasm Open in Isolation browser ƒe kpeɖeŋutɔ naa ɖusi-zi menu ƒe tiatia be nàʋu web links le Workspaces isolated browser me. Esia wɔnɛ be wònɔa bɔbɔe eye kuxi aɖeke mele eme o be nàʋu URL siwo ŋu ɖikeke le/siwo mele dedie o dedie alo be nàlé wò nyatakakawo me ɖe asi. Esi wònye be woɖea nyatakakadzraɖoƒea gɔme le adzɔge dɔwɔƒe ƒe web-browser la me, le esi teƒe be woawɔe le wò kɔmpiuta si le mia gbɔ dzi ta la, àte ŋu awɔ nu kple nyatakakadzraɖoƒea dedie eye màte ŋu ayɔe o.
text.header3: Kpɔ Kasm ƒe nuŋlɔɖiwo hena nyatakaka bubuwo.

title.tooltip1: Go aʋu URL la le Dɔwɔƒe yeye aɖe me, Cast Key mɔnu nye na dɔwɔƒe si le dɔ wɔm xoxo
title.tooltip2: Ne èle nuŋɔŋlɔ ʋum le Kasm Dɔwɔƒewo ƒe ɣeyiɣi me negbe ɖe ka la nye URL si sɔ la, woatsɔe ayi na didimɔ̃
title.tooltip3: Ne èle nuŋɔŋlɔ ʋum le Dɔwɔƒe aɖe la, àte ŋu aɖɔli ka siwo wotsɔ yi Dɔwɔƒea (Find doa alɔ RegExp si sɔ kple delimiters /regexp/g)
